channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-11036] Race condition in DataNucleus makes Metastore to hang
item.description: Under moderate to high concurrent query workload Metastore gets deadlocked in DataNucleus
item.summary: Race condition in DataNucleus makes Metastore to hang

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
For stack trace see: http://www.datanucleus.org/servlet/jira/browse/NUCRDBMS-837
This has been fixed in : http://www.datanucleus.org/servlet/jira/browse/NUCRDBMS-887
I am preparing a patch to upgrade DN to 4.x line, will post that soon.

Overall: -1 no tests executed

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12740218/HIVE-11036.patch
